name: kanji-poster

screenshots.caption: Excerpt of the (much larger) JLPT2 poster

short_description:
Kanji-poster is a collection of scripts that automatically generate large, high-quality, printable  kanji and hanzi posters using data from openly available dictionary files.   

Posters list each kanji together with frequent readings and meanings.  You can generate posters for a selected set of kanji, i.e. only for kanji up to a certain grade.
summary: Generate large kanji/hanzi-posters using dictionary files
